name: d-Voting
desc: A decentralized voting system built on blockchain ensuring secure, transparent, and tamper-proof elections.

name: Weatherly
desc: A responsive weather app that fetches real-time weather data using APIs based on user location or city input.

name: Portfolio
desc: A sleek and responsive website where I showcase my projects, skills, and what I love to build

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
